answers.answer: If you think you have a UTI or a kidney infection you need to go to the doctor and get antibiotics. Kidney infections can lead to dehydration, which is bad for you and baby.
You need to go in ASAP, this can be fatal for you and baby if left untreated, and can cause premature labor. It is a very serious thing. Please go in.

question: I have a terrible pain in my back just on the right side right above my waste bad enough that I could not sleep at all last night even though I took a tylenol pm I have a weird pain in my urethra (I think that's what it's called ya know what I pee out of lol) I have never had a kidney infection but my sister has diabetes and gets them a lot and I think I have one so can I just drink some cranberry juice for a few days and see if I can get it to go away or is it something I should be concerned enough about to just go ahead to the doctors?
